name: Padisarah
desc: Pianta sacra e nobile, le cui condizioni di crescita nel suo ambiente sono molto esigenti. I boccioli dei suoi fiori possono essere lavorati per preparare spezie preziose.

customize.name: Biryani
customize.desc: An aromatic rice dish. Stir-fry the meat such that it is crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Then stew it with condiments and long-grain rice. Sprinkle a few Padisarah petals before serving. Every grain is saturated with the aroma of fatty meat and condiments. The dish has an exquisite taste only found in Sumeru.

customize.name: Anima da duello
customize.desc: Cyno's specialty. The golden grains of rice have been piled up like a most remarkable hill. As you scoop out a chunk and place the fragrant meat into your mouth, an impulse you cannot name rises within your chest — a desire to whip out your Genius Invokation deck and duel!

customize.name: Tahchin
customize.desc: A classic staple served in large quantities. Cooked rice is mixed with meat that was marinated in yogurt, then baked until its surface turns crispy. Don't forget to add a handful of Padisarah petals before serving! Both the rice and meat are enough to keep one's stomach full for a long time, making it a very popular dish at the Grand Bazaar.

customize.name: Budino di Padisarah
customize.desc: A popular dessert in Sumeru. Juices are squeezed from the petals of Padisarahs and Sumeru Roses before being mixed with milk, gelatin, sugar, and other ingredients, and then left to solidify. Cute appearance and sweet flavor make it a common sight at celebratory events in Sumeru.

customize.name: Passi vorticosi
customize.desc: Nilou's specialty. The crystal-clear cup that reminds you of an ornate jewel case contains a soft, melt-in-your-mouth pudding. The reddish coloration, like a fleeting trance, reminds you ever so much of Nilou's radiant, dancing form. Ah, would that this dance might last forever.

customize.name: Bussola di Dendro
customize.desc:
A compass that can be used in Sumeru to search for nearby chests.

For some people, the significance of life lies in exploration and discovery. Upon reaching each destination, there is always bountiful treasure awaiting.

value.name: Nilou
value.desc: La stella del Teatro Zubayr. Una fanciulla piena di calore e innocenza, che si esibisce in danze vivaci ed eleganti.

value.text: <color=#ffffffa6>Si trova nei pressi della Città di Sumeru</color>
